about_the_game:
This is the second chapter of Super Dark Deception! It contains the following levels:

- Crazy Carnevil
- Torment Therapy
- Mascot Mayhem
- Bearly Buried

content_descriptors.notes: Super Dark Deception CH2 explores some mature adult themes, such as prescription drug abuse, domestic disputes, parental emotional abuse, cancer, and death. It also displays some mild sexual content, such as suggestive dancing (Reaper Nurses) and mildly revealing outfits (Bierce's dress reveals cleavage).

detailed_description:
This is the second chapter of Super Dark Deception! It contains the following levels:

- Crazy Carnevil
- Torment Therapy
- Mascot Mayhem
- Bearly Buried

name: Super Dark Deception - Chapter 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4330/AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 2GB/ AMD Radeon R7 370 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 60fps low settings at 1080p
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7, Windows 8.1, or Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Corei5-6600K/ AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 3GB/ AMD Radeon RX 580 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 60fps high settings at 1080p

short_description: Journey further into the realm of nightmares in the second chapter of Super Dark Deception!
